caption: Snow wolves are magical creatures living in the highest valleys in the world, created in collaboration between India and ancient humans. They are idols of a forest, as their world is rarely seen by humans. In this world, they face persecution and challenges, yet they have their own ways to survive. Snow wolves are magical creatures, living in the highest valleys in the world, created in collaboration between India and ancient humans. They are idols of a forest because their world is rarely seen by humans. They face persecution and challenges but have their own ways of survival. Female's large eyes give her a great grip, her long tail helps her balance, and she can sit quietly on her own buttocks. Golden birds search for the weak or injured in the canyon and can easily take away small birds. Snow wolves are idols, as their world is rarely seen by humans.
